description: As Chelsea Clinton was in the Keystone State on Sunday, it was revealed by WikiLeaks that she had reportedly misused Clinton Foundation funds.
title: The Apple Doesn't Fall Far: As Chelsea Clinton Campaigns, Her Personal Financial Life Is Exposed on WikiLeaks
title_page: The Apple Doesn't Fall Far: As Chelsea Clinton Campaigns, Her Personal Financial Life Is Exposed on WikiLeaks | Breitbart
text:
As Chelsea Clinton was in the Keystone State on Sunday, it was revealed by WikiLeaks that she had reportedly misused Clinton Foundation funds for a number of things, including her 2010 wedding.
Chelsea Clinton was out on the campaign trail stumping for her mom, Hillary Clinton, in the final days of the election season. Chelsea had Pennsylvania stops in Chester, Morton, West Chester, Norristown, and Elkins Park. As she made the various stops on the campaign trail, the internet was buzzing about what was revealed in the WikiLeaks emails in regard to her use of foundation funds and resources for her personal financial use.
According to Breitbart News’s Jerome Hudson, “Former top Clinton Foundation staffer Doug Band wrote a letter to Hillary Clinton campaign chairman John Podesta warning him that a probe into Chelsea Clinton’s use of ‘foundation resources for her wedding and life for a decade’ could hurt the entire organization, according to a WikiLeaks email dump.”
This amazing group of volunteers is headed out to canvass in Norristown, PA! #ProudToBePA pic.twitter.com/QWgfkicapm — Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) November 6, 2016
Chelsea spent Sunday convincing voters why her mother is the right choice for America. She also spent time targeting undecided voters, millennials, and minorities, and she attempted to convince them that Donald Trump was not the answer America needs.
Chelsea Clinton has been a very public figure of her mother’s campaign since her original run for president in 2008.
In the final day of campaigning before Election Day on Tuesday, Chelsea was doing all that she could to get her mother elected, but at the same time, she was battling opposing questions about her own mishandling of funds and living off of the foundation.
Pennsylvania is one of the most important states for both candidates.
Chelsea Clinton in Norristown says keep knocking on doors and keep talking neighbor to neighbor!! Lets #GOTVforHRC!! #ProudToBePA #PA pic.twitter.com/J8rWUCbFM3 — Jack Miller (@politicalmiller) November 6, 2016
@ChelseaClinton urging people in Chester, Pa to get to the polls on Tuesday @FOX29philly pic.twitter.com/BvHubWgAh0 — jennifer joyce (@JenniJoyceTV) November 6, 2016
Thank you @ChelseaClinton for posing with my son's #FlatStanley! We are all working hard to #GOTV! https://t.co/QNSLcnzSJo — Josh Shapiro (@JoshShapiroPA) November 6, 2016
